programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '90s - Paul Reiser (12/7/89)
programme.desc: Paul Reiser tells Johnny what he says to people, so they’ll think he’s listening to them when he really isn’t.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (10/5/89)
programme.desc: Carl chats about wife Estelle, a nose injury, forgetfulness, and When Harry Met Sally, by his son Rob Reiner.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Joan Rivers (5/17/74)
programme.desc: Joan Rivers talks about California living and Vincent Price thinks horror movies are fun.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Bette Davis (1/7/88)
programme.desc: Bette Davis comments on her Kennedy Center award and President Reagan.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Carrie Fisher (7/29/83)
programme.desc: Carrie Fisher talks Return of the Jedi and Garry Shandling gets more than a few laughs.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Billy Crystal (6/11/86)
programme.desc: Billy Crystal sounds off on cable TV vs. satellite dishes. Plus Arnold Schwarzenegger and Michael Ammar.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '70s - Rodney Dangerfield (7/3/74)
programme.desc: Johnny gives questionable amounts of respect to Rodney Dangerfield.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '50s - Bob Hope (5/21/74)
programme.desc: Bob Hope stops by to talk about his many honorary degrees, plus Don Rickles insults pretty much everyone.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Shelley Winters (8/28/87)
programme.desc: Johnny chats with Shelley Winters.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Kenneth Branagh (8/23/91)
programme.desc: Comedian David Steinberg talks about going to Theological school before his career as a comedian.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '80s - Patrick Duffy (2/12/80)
programme.desc: Patrick Duffy says he always dreamed of becoming a TV star but now he wants to change his nice guy image.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '50s - Jimmy Stewart (12/11/80)
programme.desc: Oscar-winner James Stewart chats about his holiday shopping and plans for Christmas.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Hollywood Icons Of The '90s - Kenneth Branagh (2/1/90)
programme.desc: Famed Shakespearean actor Kenneth Branagh talks about the thrill of meeting Kirk Douglas

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '60s - Carl Reiner (2/2/78)
programme.desc: Hollywood legend Carl Reiner stops by with his toupee. Plus, Jack Klugman talks examining dead bodies.

programme.title: The Johnny Carson Show
programme.sub-title: Comic Legends Of The '80s - Chevy Chase (5/30/85)
programme.desc: To celebrate turning 40 Chevy Chase joins Johnny to talk about his new movie, Fletch.
